name: Dominos Tournament
short_description: $15 Admission/player includes one drink + one cigar
long_description:
Sunday, Feb 4th 8-11pm
$15 per person includes one drink & one cigar

 

Drink Specials:

Pilar Rum Punch $8
Pilar Rum Old Fashion $8
Pilar Dark & Stormy $8
Fireball Shots $5
Beer Pong Specials at Rum Row $12



FOR LADIES, FIRST RUM PUNCH IS FREE!!

 

TOURNAMENT PRIZES

 

First Place Team Total

One Night Stay At Gates Hotel South Beach -2 Miami Heat Tickets Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Including Facial Scrub Package and Hot Towel Shave from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio -5 Pack Of Cigars

 

Second Place Team Total

Full Day Boat Rental from Paradise Boat Rental -team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio -5 Pack of Cigars

 

Third Place Team Total

Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub From Imjuscuttin Barber Studio -2 Bottles Of Pilar Rum -5 Pack of Cigars-Gates Beach Towels

 

Live DJ from 8-11pm
